about_the_game:
🌲 A quiet forest. A flickering light. One last desperate ride home.

The Last Ride Home is more than just a ride—it’s a desperate fight for survival. As the forest closes in and the flickering light threatens to fail, every second counts. Navigate treacherous paths, evade deadly obstacles, and outpace the creature lurking just behind you. Will you make it home?

🌟 Main Features:

🔦 A broken, unpredictable bike light:
Your bike’s light flickers uncontrollably—ranging from faint glows to complete blackouts. Quickly memorize your surroundings before the darkness consumes you. To restore the light, you’ll have to tap it back on—but beware: Doing so will make steering harder, and one wrong move could be fatal!

🛑 Deadly mistakes:

  • Stay on the path: Leaving the road or crashing into obstacles could be your end.

  • No stopping: Stand still for too long, and the creature will catch you.

  • No turning back: The forest doesn’t forgive mistakes—every path you take is final.

🦌 The stag monster with its golden antlers:
A shadowy figure born from the forest’s myths stalks you with glowing eyes and a cruel grin. It’s faster than you think, and every mistake brings it closer to you.

🛣️ Branching paths and haunting checkpoints:
Every route is different, and each choice hides secrets: abandoned cabins, forgotten graves, warning signs, or remnants of previous victims. These visual cues subtly reveal the forest’s tragic past. But you don’t have time to dwell—keep your eyes on the road!

⌛ Time pressure and growing danger:
Your time is limited. Every wrong turn or second spent in darkness could lead to your doom. Balance speed, awareness, and quick reflexes to survive.

📈 Progress and threat indicators:
Keep track of your journey: See how close you are to your destination—and how near the creature is to catching you. There’s no room for mistakes.

🎮 Core Gameplay Mechanics:

  • 🚴 Speed and precise steering: Constantly adjust your speed—race forward to escape the creature, but slow down to navigate sharp turns or avoid deadly obstacles.

  • 🔦 Bike light management: Your broken light demands quick reactions. Tap it back on before you’re plunged into total darkness, but don’t lose control of your bike while doing so.

  • ⚡ Quicktime events: React quickly to sudden light failures or obstacles on the path. One mistake could spell disaster.

  • 👁️ Focus and awareness: Memorize the road ahead, including turns, obstacles, and checkpoints, before the darkness takes over.

  • 🛣️ Story-driven checkpoints: The eerie visuals along your journey hint at what happened in this cursed forest—old warning signs, abandoned objects, and traces of past victims tell their own tale. But you can’t afford to stop and investigate—keep moving.

  • ⏰ Time pressure: The clock is ticking—if you don’t reach your destination in time, the darkness will claim you.

content_descriptors.notes:
The Last Ride Home" contains the following mature content:

Subtle depictions of violence and corpses within the game environment (e.g., bloodstains and bodies embedded into the atmosphere).
Intense psychological horror with a dark and threatening atmosphere.
Frightening scenarios focusing on suspense and underlying threats instead of explicit violence.
Note: There are no explicit depictions of mutilation, sexual content, or drug use. The focus is on psychological horror and atmosphere.

short_description: In this atmospheric horror game, you take on the role of a lone cyclist navigating through a deep, eerie forest at night. With only a broken bike light as your companion and a threatening presence behind you, there’s only one goal: Get home before it’s too late.
